$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/main.text:
!! Edit Main Navigation !!! Colours <$edit-text tag="input" size="28" tiddler="$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/settings" index="colour-main-nav" class=""/> – background
<$edit-text tag="input" size="28" tiddler="$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/settings" index="colour-new-button" class=""/> – new button background !!! Buttons Make sure to have only a few buttons here so that they are all visible on small mobile screens! <$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/TopLeftBar" class="te-edit-text"/> To return to the original state, simply delete the tiddler $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/TopLeftBar that stores your changes. !!! Top left bar To make sure, this comes first in the HTML code of this page, the so called left top bar is used for the main navigation. It displays all elements tagged <> – in case you have other items there, you can click the tag pill and reorder them via drag and drop.
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/main.title: $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/main
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/main.creator: Thomas Elmiger

$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/readme.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/readme.text:
!! Navigator Theme

This is a so called //theme// for [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com]] (TW). It is here to make navigation as easy as possible.


!!! Main Navigation

At the bottom of the screen, where they are easy to reach on mobile devices, we have the most important functions. If you want to add or remove buttons, you are able to do that by changing [[$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/TopLeftBar]] or on the tab //main// of the plugin.


!!! Sidebar Navigation

{{$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/menu}} This button toggles the secondary navigation, known as the //sidebar// in TW. The button is available in the main navigation and as a //page control// tool in the sidebar itself. – On small screens, tap or click anywhere besides the sidebar to close it.

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/settings" index="hide-secondary-nav" checked="yes" unchecked="no"> hide secondary navigation on startup</$checkbox>

You can [[add your own tabs|https://tiddlywiki.com/#How%20to%20add%20a%20new%20tab%20to%20the%20sidebar]] there, e.g. a [[table of contents|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Adding%20a%20table%20of%20contents%20to%20the%20sidebar]], click the links to learn how.

The sidebar contains all elements tagged <<tag $:/tags/SideBarSegment>>.


!!! Top Navigation

At the top of the screen is a bar for three icons or buttons. See [[$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/TopRightBar]] or on the tab //top// of the plugin.


!!! New Element

The [[big button|$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/new-tiddler-big]] in the lower right of the screen opens a new addition in the story. 

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/settings" index="show-new-button" checked="yes" unchecked="no"> show big new element button</$checkbox>


!!! Keyboard Shortcut Hints

On big screens, the main navigation at the bottom can show hints for keyboard shortcuts (TW versions from 5.1.18).

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/settings" index="show-kbd-hints" checked="yes" unchecked="no"> show keyboard hints</$checkbox>


!! Recommended Plugins

Navigator works best together with these [[other plugins|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html]] from the same author: 

* [[Simple Search|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Ftelmiger%2Fsimple-search]]
* [[MyStory|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Ftelmiger%2FMyStory]]


!!! Feedback
Please visit the friendly [[TW user group on Google|https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/tiddlywiki]] to connect to other users or the author Thomas Elmiger.


!! Core overruling

This plugin overwrites $:/core/ui/TopBar/menu and nothing else.
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/readme.title: $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/readme
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/readme.caption: Theme Tweaks

$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/settings.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/settings.text:
hide-secondary-nav: yes
colour-main-nav: rgb(200, 225, 211)
colour-new-button: <<colour sidebar-tab-background>>
show-new-button: no
show-kbd-hints: no
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/settings.title: $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/settings

$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/styles/dyna.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/styles/dyna.title: $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/styles/dynamic.css

$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/top.text:
!! Edit Top Navigation


!!! Buttons

Make sure to have the exact number of three buttons here so that they are all usable on small mobile screens!

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/TopRightBar" class="te-edit-text"/> 

To return to the original state, simply delete the tiddler $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/TopRightBar that stores your changes.


!!! Top right bar

To make sure, this comes second in the HTML code of this page, the so called right top bar is used for the top navigation. It displays all elements tagged <<tag $:/tags/TopRightBar>> – in case you have other items there, it might be best to place them in the list above or to remove them.
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/top.title: $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/top
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/top.creator: Thomas Elmiger

$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.text:
<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="no"> <$button set="$:/state/sidebar" setTo="no" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/HideSideBar/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/HideSideBar/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible te-menu-close tc-selected">
<$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/icons/menu-close}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/language/Buttons/HideSideBar/Caption}} <$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="match" text="no"> <$button set="$:/state/sidebar" setTo="yes" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/ShowSideBar/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/ShowSideBar/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible te-menu-open"> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/icons/menu-open}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/language/Buttons/ShowSideBar/Caption}}
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.title: $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/menu
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.caption: {{$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/icons/menu-open}} Sidebar Navigation

$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.text:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible te-btn-to-top" tooltip="top of the story">
<$list variable="target" filter="[list[$:/StoryList]first[]]">
<$action-navigate $to=<<target>>/>
</$list>
{{$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/icons/to-top}}
</$button>
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.title: $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/to-top
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.creator: Thomas Elmiger

$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/styles/stat.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/styles/stat.title: $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/styles/static.css

$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.text: \define control-panel-button(class) <$button to="$:/themes/telmiger/navigator" tooltip={{!!description}} aria-label={{!!description}} class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $class$"""> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/icon}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> About Navigator \end <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title[$:/themes/telmiger/navigator]]" emptyMessage=<>> <>

$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.caption: {{$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/icon}} About Navigator

$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.text: \define open-control-panel() <$action-navigate $to="$:/ControlPanel"/> \end \define control-panel-button(class:"not-selected") <$button tooltip="show/hide control panel" aria-label="show/hide control panel" class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $class$"""> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/ControlPanel/Caption}}/> <$list filter="[<__class__>prefix[tc-selected]]" emptyMessage=<>> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param="$:/ControlPanel"/> \end <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title[$:/ControlPanel]]" emptyMessage=<>> <>
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.title: $:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/control-panel
$:/themes/telmiger/navigator/ui/Buttons/.caption: {{$:/core/images/options-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/ControlPanel/Caption}}
